page.syntax: Answer as P = ui_get_list3P(C title ,C default_selection ,C choices )

argument.name: Answer
argument.description: A dot variable with two elements.

item.name: .Selection = A CR-LF delimited list of user selections.

argument.name: title
argument.description: The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: choices
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of choices.

page.description: Displays a listbox-checkbox. User can select multiple items. Items are returned in the same order in which they are selected. Same as ui_get_list3(), but returns two properties: .lastbutton and .selection
page.discussion: The UI_GET_LIST3P() function displays a check box - list box that allows the user to make multiple selections.

section.example: dim choices as C choices = <<%a% one two three four five %a% ? ui_get_list3p("Select One or More Choices", "three", choices) = lastbutton = "OK" selection = three four
